sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_68c6c17cc3638e10d1b77aef0501314f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>fetch_kore_config</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	try{
		var ans = [];
		var grInt = new GlideRecord("x_kore_widget_aa_0_kore_configuration");
		grInt.addQuery("table_key","koreai");
		grInt.query();

		while(grInt.next()){
			var obj = {}; 
			obj.aaWidgetURL = grInt.getValue("agentassist_url");
			obj.botId = grInt.getValue("bot_id");
			obj.clientId = grInt.getValue("client_id");
			obj.clientSecret = grInt.getValue("client_secret");
			obj.aaToken = grInt.getValue("aatoken");

			ans.push(obj);
		}

		response.setBody(ans);
		
	}catch(err){
		response.setStatus(500); // Internal Server Error
		response.setBody({ error: err });
	}



})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_kore_widget_aa_0/fetch_kore_config/configuration</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/configuration</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snigdha amireddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-19 17:16:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>68c6c17cc3638e10d1b77aef0501314f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetch_kore_config</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai" source="x_kore_widget_aa_0">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_68c6c17cc3638e10d1b77aef0501314f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sbiswas</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-02 03:30:34</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="kore_scripted_rest_api">d5a4cdb8c3638e10d1b77aef0501315d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_58bc0878c36f4e10d1b77aef050131e3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_cs_message</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Kore_business_rule</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    try {
		var msg = current.payload; 
		var isAgent = current.is_agent;
		var messageType = current.message_type;
		var agent_id = current.recipient;
        if (messageType == "text") {
            // Get the sysId dynamically
			var sys_id = current.conversation;

			// Get the botId, token dynamically from kore-configuration table with table_key as "kore"
			var grK = new GlideRecord("x_kore_widget_aa_0_kore_configuration");
			grK.addQuery("table_key","koreai");
			grK.query();

			if(grK.next()){
				botId = grK.getValue("bot_id");
				aaToken = grK.getValue("aatoken");
				aaURL = grK.getValue("agentassist_url");
			}

			gs.info("===aaURL==="+aaURL);
			// gs.info("===type of aaURL==="+typeof(aaURL));
			var domain = aaURL.split("/")[2];

			gs.info("~~domain:: "+domain);

			// Server side approach to send message to AA widget
			if(sys_id && botId){

				var request;
				request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
				var APIURL  = 'https://'+domain+'/agentassist/api/v1/hooks/'+botId+'';

				gs.info("~~APIURL is:: "+APIURL);

				request.setEndpoint(APIURL);
				request.setHttpMethod('POST');
				request.setRequestHeader('token', ""+aaToken);
				request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');

				var payload = {
				"conversationId":"" + sys_id ,
				"query": "" + msg,
				"botId": ""+botId ,
				"agentId": "",
				"experience": "chat",
				"entities": [],
				"sendUserMessage": !isAgent,
				"sendAgentMessage": !(!isAgent),
				"language": "en",
				"fromThirdParty":true,
				"author":{
					"type":isAgent?"AGENT":"USER"
				}
				};

				gs.info("Payload to sent to AA: "+ JSON.stringify(payload));
				
				request.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(payload));


				var response = request.executeAsync();
				var responseBody = response.getBody();
				var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

			}
        }
    } catch (error) {
        gs.debug("Error occured while sending message : " + error);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snigdha amireddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-19 13:02:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>58bc0878c36f4e10d1b77aef050131e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Kore_business_rule</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai" source="x_kore_widget_aa_0">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_58bc0878c36f4e10d1b77aef050131e3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sbiswas</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-13 03:19:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=58bc0878c36f4e10d1b77aef050131e3"/></record_update>

				} });","export default {
 cdn_link: "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/crypto-js/3.1.9-1/crypto-js.min.js",
 Agent_Assist_Widget_Tag: 'kore-widget-aa',
 Active_Agent_Chat_Tag: 'sn-agent-chat:not([hidden])',
 Message_Field_Tag: 'textarea',
 Send_Button_Tag: 'now-button',
 Active_Chat_Screen_Tag: 'sn-canvas-screen:not([style*="display: none"])',
 Active_Page_Tag: 'sn-canvas-experience-shell:not([style*="display: none"])'
}","import { createCustomElement, actionTypes } from '@servicenow/ui-core';
import { createHttpEffect } from '@servicenow/ui-effect-http';
import snabbdom from '@servicenow/ui-renderer-snabbdom';
const { COMPONENT_BOOTSTRAPPED } = actionTypes;
import styles from './styles.scss';
import config from "../../config.js";

const addCDNLink = (url, type = 'script') => {
	if (!document.querySelector(`script[src="${url}"]`)) {
		const script = document.createElement('script');
		script.src = url;
		// script.async = true;
		console.log("----------->>>>url", url)
		document.head.appendChild(script);
	}
};

function generateToken(payload) {
	try {
		var secret = payload.clientSecret;

		const data = {
			'iss': payload.clientId,
			'sub': 'number',
			'aud': payload.aud,
			'botId': payload.botId,
			'isAnonymous': payload.isAnonymous
		}

		var base64UrlHeader = btoa(JSON.stringify({ "alg": "HS256", "typ": "JWT" })).replace(/=/g, '').replace(/\+/g, '-').replace(/\//g, '_');
		console.log(" ~ generateToken ~ base64UrlHeader:", base64UrlHeader)

		var base64UrlPayload = btoa(JSON.stringify(data)).replace(/=/g, '').replace(/\+/g, '-').replace(/\//g, '_');
		console.log(" ~ generateToken ~ base64UrlPayload:", base64UrlPayload)

		var signature = CryptoJS.HmacSHA256(base64UrlHeader + '.' + base64UrlPayload, secret).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Base64).replace(/=/g, '').replace(/\+/g, '-').replace(/\//g, '_');
		console.log(" ~ generateToken ~ signature:", signature)

		var jwt = base64UrlHeader + '.' + base64UrlPayload + '.' + signature;
		console.log(" ~ generateToken ~ jwt:", jwt)
		return jwt;
	} catch (error) {
		console.log(error)
		return null;
	}
}

function searchElement(node, id){
	try{
		let found = node.querySelector(id);
		if(found){
			return found;
		}
		for(var i = 0; i < node.childElementCount; i++){
			let result = searchElement(node.children[i], id);
			if(result){
				return result;
			}
		}
		if(node.shadowRoot) {
			let result = searchElement(node.shadowRoot, id);
			if(result){
				return result;
			}
		}
		return null;
	} catch(err){
		console.log("Error while fetching element: ", err);
		return null;
	}
}

const view = (state, { updateState }) => {
	const { cId, aaWidgetURL, botId, clientId, clientSecret, token } = state;
	const { sysId } = state.properties;
	console.log(" ~ view ~ sysId:", sysId)
	console.log(" ~ view ~ state:", state)
	let currentConversationId = cId;
	let domainURL = new URL(aaWidgetURL).origin;

	let iframeURL = `${aaWidgetURL}?token=${token}&botid=${botId}&agentassisturl=${domainURL}&conversationid=${currentConversationId}&source=servicenow`

	console.log(" ~ iframeURL:", iframeURL)

	return (
		<div style={{ height: '74vh', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }}>

			<iframe id="agentassist-iframe" src={iframeURL} height="98%" width="100%" frameBorder="0"></iframe>

		</div>
	)
};

createCustomElement('kore-widget-aa', {
	renderer: { type: snabbdom },
	view,
	styles,
	properties: {
		sysId: {
			default: "" 
		}
	},
	actionHandlers: {
		[COMPONENT_BOOTSTRAPPED]: async (coeffects) => {
			const { dispatch, updateState } = coeffects;
			console.log("--------Checking------>>>")
			addCDNLink(config.cdn_link, "script")

			dispatch('FETCH_KORE_CONFIGURATION', {
				sysparm_limit: '1',
				sysparm_query: 'ORDERBYDESCnumber'
			});
			dispatch('FETCH_CONVERSATION_ID', {
				sysparm_limit: '1',
				sysparm_query: 'ORDERBYDESCnumber'
			});
		},
		'FETCH_KORE_CONFIGURATION': createHttpEffect('api/x_kore_widget_aa_0/fetch_kore_config/configuration', {
			method: 'GET',
			queryParams: ['sysparm_limit', 'sysparm_query'],
			successActionType: 'FETCH_KORE_CONFIGURATION_SUCCESS'
		}),
		'FETCH_KORE_CONFIGURATION_SUCCESS': (coeffects) => {
			const { action, updateState, dispatch } = coeffects;
			console.log(" ~ action:", action)
			const { result } = action.payload;
			const { aaWidgetURL, botId, clientId, clientSecret, aaToken } = result[0];
			const options = {
				clientId: clientId,
				clientSecret: clientSecret,
				botId: botId,
				identity: "number",
				aud: "https://idproxy.kore.com/authorize",
				isAnonymous: false
			}

			const token = generateToken(options);
			console.log(" ~ token:", token)
			if (!aaToken) {
				dispatch('POST_AATOKEN_TO_SNOW', {
					payload: { aaToken: token },
				});
			}

			updateState({ aaWidgetURL, botId, clientId, clientSecret, token });

		},
		'FETCH_CONVERSATION_ID': createHttpEffect('api/x_kore_widget_aa_0/fetch_kore_config/activeInteractionId', {
			method: 'GET',
			queryParams: ['sysparm_limit', 'sysparm_query'],
			successActionType: 'FETCH_CONVERSATION_ID_SUCCESS'
		}),
		'FETCH_CONVERSATION_ID_SUCCESS': (coeffects) => {
			const { action, dispatch, updateState } = coeffects;
			const { result } = action.payload;
			const { cId } = result[0];
			updateState({ cId });
			dispatch('AA_EVENT_LISTENER');
		},
		'POST_AATOKEN_TO_SNOW': createHttpEffect('api/x_kore_widget_aa_0/fetch_kore_config/token', {
			method: 'POST',
			dataParam: "payload",
			queryParams: ['sysparm_limit', 'sysparm_query'],
			successActionType: 'POST_AATOKEN_TO_SNOW_SUCCESS',
			errorActionType: 'POST_AATOKEN_TO_SNOW_FAILURE'
		}),
		'POST_AATOKEN_TO_SNOW_SUCCESS': (coeffects) => {
			const { action, updateState } = coeffects;
			const { result } = action.payload;
			console.log("result:: ", result.result);
		},
		'POST_AATOKEN_TO_SNOW_FAILURE': (coeffects) => {
			const { action } = coeffects;
			console.error(" ~ Error occurred:", action.payload);
		},
		'AA_EVENT_LISTENER': (coeffects) => {
			const { state, dispatch } = coeffects;
			const { cId } = state;
			console.log(coeffects);
			window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
				try{
					console.log("*** Event *** ", event);
					if(event.data.method === "agentassist_loaded") {
						let activePage = searchElement(globalThis.document.body, config.Active_Page_Tag);
						let activeScreen = searchElement(activePage, config.Active_Chat_Screen_Tag);
						let koreWidget = searchElement(activeScreen, config.Agent_Assist_Widget_Tag);
						let parentElement = koreWidget.parentNode;
						parentElement.style.height = '100%';
					} else if (event.data.name === "agentAssist.CopyMessage" && event.data.conversationId == cId) {
						let msg = decodeURI(encodeURI(event.data.payload));
			
						globalThis.navigator.clipboard.writeText(msg).then(() => {
							console.log('Text successfully copied to clipboard');
						})
						.catch(err => {
							console.log('Could not copy text: ' + err);
						});

						try{
							let agentChat = searchElement(document.body, config.Active_Agent_Chat_Tag);

							let messageInputField = searchElement(agentChat, config.Message_Field_Tag);
							messageInputField.value = msg;
							messageInputField.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'));
						} catch(err){
							console.log("Error while copying message:", err);
						}	
					} else if (event.data.name === "agentAssist.SendMessage" && event.data.conversationId == cId) {
						try{
							let msg = decodeURI(encodeURI(event.data.payload));
							
							let agentChat = searchElement(document.body, config.Active_Agent_Chat_Tag);
							
							let messageInputField = searchElement(agentChat, config.Message_Field_Tag);
							messageInputField.value = msg;
							messageInputField.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'));
							
							setTimeout(() => {
								let nowSendButton = searchElement(agentChat, config.Send_Button_Tag);
								nowSendButton.dispatchEvent(new MouseEvent('click'));
							}, 100);
						} catch(err){
							console.log("Error while sending message: ", err);
						}
					} else if (event.data.name === "agentAssist.conversation_summary" && event.data.conversationId == cId) {
						let summary = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(event.data)).payload.summary[0].summary_text;

						dispatch('STORE_SUMMARY', {
							payload:{
								conversationId: cId,
								summary: summary,
							},
						});
					}
				} catch(err) {
					console.log("Error: " + err);
				}
			});
		},
		'STORE_SUMMARY': createHttpEffect('api/x_kore_widget_aa_0/fetch_kore_config/summary', {
			method: 'PATCH',
			dataParam: "payload",
			successActionType: 'STORE_SUMMARY_SUCCESS',
			errorActionType: 'STORE_SUMMARY_FAILURE'
		}),
		'STORE_SUMMARY_SUCCESS': (coeffects) => {
			const { action } = coeffects;
			const { result } = action.payload;
			console.log("Result: ", result);
		},
		'STORE_SUMMARY_FAILURE': (coeffects) => {
			const { action } = coeffects;
			const { result } = action.payload;
			console.log("Error: ", result);
		}
	}
});
","import * as exports from '/home/Sumit.Biswas/kore/KoreSA-Integrations/KoreAI-Servicenow/ui-component-kore/src/index.js';

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_59690d30c3a38e10d1b77aef050131ad
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>PATCH</http_method><name>store_chat_summary</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    // implement resource here
	try{
		var requestBody = request.body.data; 

		var interactions = new GlideRecord('interaction');
		interactions.addQuery('channel_metadata_document', requestBody.conversationId);
		interactions.setValue('chat_summary', requestBody.summary);
		interactions.updateMultiple();

		response.setStatus(200); // OK
		response.setBody({ result: 'Summary updated in interaction' });
	} catch(err){
		response.setStatus(500); // Internal Server Error
		response.setBody({ error: err });
	}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013172
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="SRP Record koreai">7782e581c32bce1082881b6ce00131dc</macroponent><name>Set Tab Icon for Interaction</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const output = api.data.interaction_query.output;
    if (output === undefined || output.data.GlideRecord_Query.interaction._results[0] === undefined)
        return;

    const {
        type: {
            value: type
        },
        active: {
            value: active
        }
    } = output.data.GlideRecord_Query.interaction._results[0];

    const ICON_CHAT_FILL = 'chat-fill';
    const ICON_CHAT_OUTLINE = 'chat-outline';
    const ICON_PHONE_FILL = 'phone-fill';
    const ICON_PHONE_OUTLINE = 'phone-outline';
    const ICON_GROUP_FILL = 'user-fill';
    const ICON_GROUP_OUTLINE = 'user-outline';
    const ICON_ONGOING_FILL = 'ongoing-fill';
    const ICON_ONGOING_OUTLINE = 'ongoing-outline';
    const ICON_VIDEO_FILL = 'video-chat-fill';
    const ICON_VIDEO_OUTLINE = 'video-chat-outline';
    const ICON_MICROSOFT_FILL = 'microsoft-teams-fill';
    const ICON_MICROSOFT_OUTLINE = 'microsoft-teams-outline';
    const ICON_ZOOM_FILL = 'zoom-fill';
    const ICON_ZOOM_OUTLINE = 'zoom-outline';

    const iconConfig = {
        phone: {
            active: ICON_PHONE_FILL,
            inactive: ICON_PHONE_OUTLINE
        },
        chat: {
            active: ICON_CHAT_FILL,
            inactive: ICON_CHAT_OUTLINE
        },
        walkup: {
            active: ICON_GROUP_FILL,
            inactive: ICON_GROUP_OUTLINE
        },
        messaging: {
            active: ICON_ONGOING_FILL,
            inactive: ICON_ONGOING_OUTLINE
        },
        video: {
            active: ICON_VIDEO_FILL,
            inactive: ICON_VIDEO_OUTLINE
        },
        microsoft_teams_chat: {
            active: ICON_MICROSOFT_FILL,
            inactive: ICON_MICROSOFT_OUTLINE
        },
        teams_call: {
            active: ICON_MICROSOFT_FILL,
            inactive: ICON_MICROSOFT_OUTLINE
        },
        zoom_chat: {
            active: ICON_ZOOM_FILL,
            inactive: ICON_ZOOM_OUTLINE
        }
    };

    const status = active ? "active" : "inactive";
    const getIndicatorIcon = ({
        type,
        status
    }) => {
        const iconType = iconConfig[type];
        return iconType ? iconType[status] : iconConfig['chat'][status];
    };

    const updateStatus = (iconName, status) => {
        helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
            helpers.screen.updateStatus({
                icon: {
                    name: iconName,
                    status: status
                }
            });
        }, 100);
    };
    const iconName = getIndicatorIcon({
        type,
        status
    });
    updateStatus(iconName, status);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sbiswas</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-20 13:51:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>c092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013172</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Tab Icon for Interaction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai" source="x_kore_widget_aa_0">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013172</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sbiswas</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-20 13:51:59</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_1092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013194
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="SRP Record koreai">7782e581c32bce1082881b6ce00131dc</macroponent><name>Bind Dismiss Tab</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    {
        "message": "Are you sure you want to close the record tab? This will end wrap up and close the interaction."
    },
    {
        "message": "Are you sure you want to close the record tab? This will end the chat and close the interaction."
    }
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const response = api.data.interaction_query.output.data.GlideRecord_Query.interaction._results[0];
    if (response === undefined)
        return;
    let hasWarning = false;

    if (response.assigned_to.value === api.context.session.user.sys_id && response.active.value &&
        ((response.type.value === 'chat') || (response.type.value === 'messaging' && response.state.value === 'wrap_up')))
        hasWarning = true;

    var modal = "[component-id$='interaction_confirm_modal']";

    if (response.state.value === 'wrap_up')
        helpers.translate("Are you sure you want to close the record tab? This will end wrap up and close the interaction.").then((val) => {
            api.setState('confirmModalText', val);
        });
    else
        helpers.translate("Are you sure you want to close the record tab? This will end the chat and close the interaction.").then((val) => {
            api.setState('confirmModalText', val);
        });

    api.emit('SCREEN_STATUS_CHANGED', {
        hasWarning: hasWarning,
        warningModalId: modal
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sbiswas</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-20 13:52:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>1092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013194</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Bind Dismiss Tab</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai" source="x_kore_widget_aa_0">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013194</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sbiswas</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-20 13:52:00</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>post_AA_token</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	try{

		// Parse the request body
		var requestBody = request.body.data;
		var customTable = new GlideRecord('x_kore_widget_aa_0_kore_configuration');
		customTable.addQuery("table_key","koreai");
		customTable.query();

		if(customTable.next()){

			var aaToken =  requestBody.aaToken;

			// Set fields on the custom table
			customTable["aatoken"] = requestBody.aaToken;
			// Add more fields as necessary
			var updated = customTable.update(); 
			
			if (updated) {
				response.setStatus(200); // OK
				response.setBody({ result: 'Record updated', sys_id: customTable.sys_id });
			} else {
				response.setStatus(500); // Internal Server Error
				response.setBody({ error: 'Failed to update record' });
			}

		}
	}catch(err){
		response.setStatus(500); // Internal Server Error
		response.setBody({ error: err });
	}



})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_kore_widget_aa_0/fetch_kore_config/token</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/token</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snigdha amireddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-19 17:21:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>44a8c9fcc3638e10d1b77aef05013140</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>post_AA_token</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai" source="x_kore_widget_aa_0">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_44a8c9fcc3638e10d1b77aef05013140</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sbiswas</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-23 07:56:10</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="kore_scripted_rest_api">d5a4cdb8c3638e10d1b77aef0501315d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013169
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="SRP Record koreai">7782e581c32bce1082881b6ce00131dc</macroponent><name>Tab Switch Handler</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const eventName = event.name;
    const _getRecordPageTabsMap = () => (api.data.associated_record_page_tabs.output || {});
    const _getInlineTabs = () => ({
        "details": {
            "condition": true
        },
        "related-lists": {
            "condition": !(api.context.app.relatedListLayout !== "horizontal")
        },
        "related-records": {
            "condition": !(!(!(api.context.app.relatedListLayout) || (api.context.app.relatedListLayout === "vertical")) || (api.context.props.sysId === "-1"))
        },
        "record-history": {
            "condition": false
        },
    });

    const _getHorizontalTabIndex = (routeType, isRL) => {
        const availableTabs = (api.viewports.record_page_tabs.routeDefinitions) || {};
        const recordPageTabsMap = _getRecordPageTabsMap();
        const recordPageInlineTabs = _getInlineTabs();
        const outputMap = {};
        let tabsInOrder = [];
        for (const [position, tabList] of Object.entries(recordPageTabsMap)) {
            outputMap[position] = {};
            for (const routeType of tabList)
                if (availableTabs.hasOwnProperty(routeType))
                    outputMap[position][routeType] = availableTabs[routeType];
        }
        tabsInOrder = tabsInOrder.concat(Object.keys(outputMap["left"]));

        if (recordPageInlineTabs["details"].condition)
            tabsInOrder.push("details");

        tabsInOrder = tabsInOrder.concat(Object.keys(outputMap["middle"]));

        if (recordPageInlineTabs["related-lists"].condition) {
            if (isRL) {
                const rlIndex = api.data.record.relatedLists.findIndex((rlItem) => rlItem.value === routeType)
                return {
                    recordTabIndex: (tabsInOrder.length + rlIndex)
                };
            } else
                api.data.record.relatedLists.forEach((rl) => tabsInOrder.push(rl.id));
        }

        if (recordPageInlineTabs["related-records"].condition) {
            let rlTabs = api.state.RelatedRecordTabs;
            if (isRL) {
                let rlIndex = -1,
                    index = 0;
                for (index = 0; index < rlTabs.length; index++) {
                    tabsInOrder.push(rlTabs[index].id);
                    rlIndex = rlTabs[index].relatedListsData.findIndex((relatedObj) => relatedObj.value === routeType);
                    if (rlIndex != -1)
                        break;
                }
                return {
                    recordTabIndex: tabsInOrder.length - 1,
                    recordSubTabIndex: rlIndex,
                    relatedListIndex: index
                };
            } else
                rlTabs.forEach((rlTab) => tabsInOrder.push(rlTab.id));
        }

        if (recordPageInlineTabs["record-history"].condition)
            tabsInOrder.push("record-history");

        tabsInOrder = tabsInOrder.concat(Object.keys(outputMap["right"]));
        return {
            recordTabIndex: tabsInOrder.indexOf(routeType)
        };
    };

    const _getSidepanelTabIndex = (routeType) => {
        const sidePanelTabs = api.viewports.viewport_gph.routeDefinitions || {};
        const sortedData = Object.fromEntries(Object.entries(sidePanelTabs).sort((a, b) => a[1].order - b[1].order));
        return Object.keys(sortedData).indexOf(routeType);
    };

    // TODO - DEF0430927 - Remove String Type conversion once the PRB is fixed.
    const _emitContentUpdatedEvent = (selectedTabIndex) => {
        if (api.context.props.selectedTabIndex == selectedTabIndex)
            return;
        api.emit('CONTENT_UPDATED', {
            params: {
                selectedTabIndex: String(selectedTabIndex),
                query: api.context.props.inputQuery,
                views: api.context.props.forcedViewName,
                extraParams: api.context.props.inputExtraParams
            }
        });
    }

    const switchTab = () => {
        const routeType = event.payload.route;
        const type = event.payload.type;

        if (!routeType || !type)
            return;
        else {
            if (type === 'record-tab') {
                const {
                    recordTabIndex
                } = _getHorizontalTabIndex(routeType);
                if (recordTabIndex !== -1)
                    _emitContentUpdatedEvent(recordTabIndex);
            } else if (type === 'contextual-sidebar') {
                const sidebarIndex = _getSidepanelTabIndex(routeType);
                if (sidebarIndex !== -1)
                    api.setState("sidebarSelectedTabIndex", sidebarIndex);
            } else if (type == "related-list") {
                const {
                    recordTabIndex,
                    recordSubTabIndex,
                    relatedListIndex
                } = _getHorizontalTabIndex(routeType, true);
                _emitContentUpdatedEvent(recordTabIndex);
                if (recordSubTabIndex) {
                    let rlTabs = api.state.RelatedRecordTabs;
                    rlTabs[relatedListIndex].subTabIndex = recordSubTabIndex;
                    // Make a shallow clone update to 'RelatedRecordTabs' to trigger the state change
                    api.setState("RelatedRecordTabs", [...rlTabs]);
                }
            }
        }
    };

    switch (eventName) {
        case 'UXF_TAB_SET#TAB_SELECTED':
            if (event.elementId == "viewport_gph" && !event.payload.isInitialPageLoad)
                api.setState("sidebarSelectedTabIndex", event.payload.selectedTabIndex);
            break;
        case 'SOW_RECORD#ROUTE_REQUESTED':
            switchTab();
            break;
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sbiswas</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-20 13:51:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>0092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013169</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Tab Switch Handler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai" source="x_kore_widget_aa_0">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0092a981c32bce1082881b6ce0013169</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sbiswas</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-20 13:51:59</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_f046817cc3638e10d1b77aef05013141
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>fetch-interactionId</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	try{
		var gr = new GlideRecord('interaction'); 

			var agent_id = gs.getUserID();
			gr.addQuery('assigned_to', agent_id); 
			gr.addQuery('active', true); 
			
			gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); // Order by creation date to get the latest interaction
			gr.query();
			var ans = [];

			while(gr.next()){
				var obj = {};
				obj.sys_id = gr.getValue("sys_id");
				obj.cId = gr.getValue("channel_metadata_document");
				obj.agent_id = agent_id;
				ans.push(obj);
			}
			
			response.setBody(ans);

	}catch(err){
		response.setStatus(500); // Internal Server Error
		response.setBody({ error: err });
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_kore_widget_aa_0/fetch_kore_config/activeInteractionId</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/activeInteractionId</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snigdha amireddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-19 17:12:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>f046817cc3638e10d1b77aef05013141</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetch-interactionId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai" source="x_kore_widget_aa_0">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f046817cc3638e10d1b77aef05013141</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sbiswas</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-13 03:26:38</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="kore_scripted_rest_api">d5a4cdb8c3638e10d1b77aef0501315d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8892a981c32bce1082881b6ce001316e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="SRP Record koreai">7782e581c32bce1082881b6ce00131dc</macroponent><name>Related List handler</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {

    const eventName = event.name;
    let RLData = api.data.record.relatedLists;
    let RLConfig = api.data.related_list_configuration.output;

    if (!RLConfig) {
        return;
    }

    const getRLTabs = () => {
        const result = [];
        RLConfig.forEach((rlConfig) => {
            let rlTab = {};
            rlTab.label = rlConfig.label;
            rlTab.id = rlConfig.id;
            rlTab.relatedListsData = filterRL(rlConfig);
            if (rlTab.relatedListsData && rlTab.relatedListsData.length > 0)
                result.push(rlTab);
        });

        api.setState("RelatedRecordTabs", result);
    };

    const filterRL = (rlConfig) => {
        const inclusionList = rlConfig.inclusionList;
        const exclusionList = rlConfig.exclusionList;
        let filteredRL = RLData;
        
        if(!RLData){
            return [];
        }

        if (inclusionList && inclusionList.length != 0) {
            filteredRL = filteredRL.filter((item) => {
                return inclusionList.indexOf(item.relatedListName) != -1;
            });
        }

        if (exclusionList && exclusionList.length != 0) {
            filteredRL = filteredRL.filter((item) => {
                return exclusionList.indexOf(item.relatedListName) == -1;
            });
        }

        return filteredRL;
    };

    switch (eventName) {
        case 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED':
            if (event.elementId === 'related_list_configuration')
                getRLTabs();
            break;

        case 'CTRL_RECORD#MACROPONENT_PROPERTY_CHANGED':
            if (event.payload && event.payload.name === 'relatedLists')
                getRLTabs();
            break;

        default:
            break;
    }

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sbiswas</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-20 13:51:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>8892a981c32bce1082881b6ce001316e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Related List handler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai" source="x_kore_widget_aa_0">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Agent AI by kore.ai">92d544cec3da0a9082881b6ce0013194</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8892a981c32bce1082881b6ce001316e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sbiswas</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-20 13:51:59</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
